nodes.text: Gord Madel was a Duros male Engineer living on Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY he was working for the Nar Shaddaa Works Administration when he was approached by Kallig with an order to detonate gas pipes running under the Meridian Hall to create an illusion of a groundquake. Madel initially tried to refuse, but was forced to comply with Kallig's orders.
